document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">seeks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Pillow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Nights, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">plain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">inspecting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not," </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ask </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">"Conscience," </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Childhood's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Nurse </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Martial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Hand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">she </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">strokes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Hair </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Upon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">wincing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Head </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"All" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Rogues </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">part </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Phosphorous </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Who is it seeks my pillow nights
